main.subjectReport: SELECT a.uname AS '人员', :displayTime AS '时间', (CASE WHEN 1=:TYPE THEN '日计划' WHEN 2=:TYPE THEN '周计划' WHEN 3=:TYPE THEN '月计划' WHEN 4=:TYPE THEN '任意期计划' ELSE '' END) AS '类型', (CASE WHEN b.send_sum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.send_sum END) AS '我的计划', (CASE WHEN c.ser_sum1 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.ser_sum1 END) AS '收到数(主送)', (CASE WHEN c.ser_sum2 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.ser_sum2 END) AS '回复数(主送)', (case when c.ser_sum2 is null or c.ser_sum2=0 then '0.00' else CAST(round(cast(cast(c.ser_sum2 AS NUMERIC)/cast(c.ser_sum1 AS NUMERIC)*100 AS NUMERIC(6,2)),2) AS VARCHAR(6)) end)+'%' AS '回复率(主送)', (CASE WHEN c.ser_sum3 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.ser_sum3 END) AS '收到数(抄送)', (CASE WHEN c.ser_sum4 IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.ser_sum4 END) AS '回复数(抄送)', (case when c.ser_sum4 is null or c.ser_sum4=0 then '0.00' else CAST(round(cast(cast(c.ser_sum4 AS NUMERIC)/cast(c.ser_sum3 AS NUMERIC)*100 AS NUMERIC(6,2)),2) AS VARCHAR(6)) end)+'%' AS '回复率(抄送)', :startTime as 'start_time',:endTime as 'end_time',:TYPE as 'planType',a.member_id as 'member_id' FROM (SELECT o.ID AS member_id, o.name AS uNAME FROM org_member o WHERE o.ID IN(:users) )a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.create_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(create_user_id) AS send_sum FROM plan_info p WHERE p.status != 1 AND p.type = :TYPE AND p.create_user_id IN(:users) AND ((DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)<=0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY,p.end_time, :endTime)>0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)>=0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:startTime, p.end_time)>=0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :endTime)>0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:endTime, p.end_time)>=0) ) GROUP BY p.create_user_id) b ON a.member_id=b.member_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pu.ref_user_id AS member_id, SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ser_sum1, SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 1 AND pu.PROCESS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ser_sum2, SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ser_sum3, SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 2 AND pu.PROCESS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ser_sum4 FROM plan_info p INNER JOIN plan_relevant_user pu ON p.id = pu.ref_plan_id WHERE p.status != 1 AND p.type = :TYPE AND pu.ref_user_id IN(:users) AND ((DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)<=0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY,p.end_time, :endTime)>0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)>=0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:startTime, p.end_time)>=0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :endTime)>0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:endTime, p.end_time)>=0) ) GROUP BY pu.ref_user_id) c ON a.member_id=c.member_id ORDER BY '我的计划' DESC

plan.body: SELECT {0} FROM plan_info p INNER JOIN plan_relevant_user pu ON p.id = pu.ref_plan_id WHERE p.status != 1 AND pu.ref_user_id IN(:users) AND {1} GROUP BY pu.ref_user_id
plan.masterReceive: SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS master_receive
plan.masterReply: SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 1 AND pu.PROCESS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS master_reply
plan.copyReceive: SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS copy_receive
plan.copyReply: SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 2 AND pu.PROCESS=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS copy_reply
plan.allReply: SUM(CASE WHEN (pu.type = 1 AND pu.PROCESS = 1) or (pu.type = 2 AND pu.PROCESS = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)AS all_reply
plan.allReceive: SUM(CASE WHEN pu.type = 1 or pu.type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS all_receive
plan.time: ((DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)<=0 AND DATEDIFF(DAY,p.end_time, :endTime)>0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :startTime)>=0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:startTime, p.end_time)>=0) OR (DATEDIFF(DAY,p.start_time, :endTime)>0 and DATEDIFF(DAY,:endTime, p.end_time)>=0) )
plan.send: SELECT p.create_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(create_user_id) AS send_sum FROM plan_info p WHERE p.status != 1 AND p.create_user_id IN(:users) AND {0} GROUP BY p.create_user_id
